statements: SELECT id, client_name, ip_address, port_number, ssl_enabled FROM secure_communication WHERE ssl_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT client_name, ip_address, port_number FROM secure_communication WHERE port_number > 8000;
SELECT id, client_name FROM secure_communication WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM secure_communication WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, client_name, ssl_enabled FROM secure_communication WHERE port_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM secure_communication WHERE ssl_enabled = true;
SELECT client_name, ip_address FROM secure_communication ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT id, client_name, port_number FROM secure_communication WHERE port_number > 5000;
SELECT client_name, ip_address, port_number FROM secure_communication WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT * FROM secure_communication WHERE port_number IS NULL OR ssl_enabled = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, createdAt FROM users ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT users.username, logs.log_message FROM users INNER JOIN logs ON users.user_id = logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, createdAt FROM users ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
SELECT user_id, log_message, timestamp FROM logs WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT client_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT id, client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT users.username, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.client_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT clients.client_name, transactions.amount FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.id = transactions.client_id WHERE transactions.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT id, client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%' OR client_phone LIKE '+44%' ORDER BY client_name ASC, client_phone DESC;
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates;
SELECT certificate FROM ssl_certificates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM client_applications WHERE app_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM server_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT app_name FROM client_applications WHERE app_id = 2
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM server_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT certificate, private_key FROM ssl_certificates
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_amount < 1000
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01T00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT o.user_id, p.name, o.quantity, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT certificate, private_key FROM ssl_config WHERE created_at < '2022-03-01';
